hiveArticle.title: Street Photography - Kodaikanal - Happy Face
hiveArticle.body:
Street Photography - Kodaikanal, Tamil Nadu, India. A shopping place in the frame where a woman is happy to see people clicking photos of their shop.

![StreetPhotography.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQimszBytCHo5UkUsRxG6PFMsgzW6k55hHnZeTkyP1Mi5/StreetPhotography1.jpg)

### Camera: Nokia 6, Edited
